name: An Average Sundae
description:
This a game project I made back in highschool around spring of 2017. Created in Game Maker Studio.  Thought it'd be fun to share.

Contains simple platforming, basic attacking, 3 levels, and 3 enemy types. Every asset, from art to sfx, is original EXCEPT the music, which is borrowed from a popular indie game, "Night in the Woods." 

My line of work is skewed towards art and animation, so forgive me if it's janky. Or if it barely functions. Or if the difficulty and balance kinda sucks. It definitely has that highschool student zest to it, but nonetheless it was my first real game project and I'm proud of it.
